register/login in KendoUI or telerik website based on current pages.  
download the licence key from there in text formatt  
Example:  
`telerik-license.txt`  
```txt
eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IlRlbGVyaWsgTGljZW5zZSBLZXkifQ..gKFp4XKQ12qOBjy3cPW3eT9gXazKTmLfYVsYsNLTP280pG7s-t_-94EFH2vI_-wERgYGQG4LpXp6KAleSz01nn2XV9y6FRVt3OV0_14k0Hfgc0VEM_D91zgrUUqW2vy39Sc4EKF5H6wSjjKA3iYvBUas7SWfmjMHpu2kBajXP7iZM4eFFEGndYoB-T3aCNe-p7cLZCZ88PqFdesekPNjvXxi0LrQFRjH1r4IGGoCfqpCdZdaIti4QKwKouMMNGy0PZZenmwxEexWJ2BlX-LoQ1kNEnN_-3oly3GO88YEdOeOn6b3tA1tDU1AD1dOgLjOcIjA9UEgXGP4eLt25rYyNA
```  
place this file in main directory of project  
then apply this command  
```sh
npm install --save @progress/kendo-licensing
```  
OR use official documentation from website if this will not work.
